pr_title: Issue 4495: Recording WARN and ERROR log entries as metrics.

timeline.message:
Recording all WARNs and ERRORs as metrics with class name as a tag.

Signed-off-by: Andrei Paduroiu <andrei.paduroiu@dell.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why not just name as ERROR_COUNTER, WARN_COUNTER? LOG_ERRORS sounds logs more than counter.
timeline.author: kevinhan88

replies.bodyText:
That would be inconsistent with the naming of the other metrics defined in this class.
Plus, I want the name "Log" in it so that I can make it clear that the source of the information is the logs, and not something else.
replies.author: andreipaduroiu

timeline.message:

Signed-off-by: Andrei Paduroiu <andrei.paduroiu@dell.com>
